txt_en: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
txt_cn: 幸福的家庭犹如人间天堂。
author: George Bernard Shaw

txt_en: Happiness is not a station you arrive at, but a manner of traveling.
txt_cn: 幸福并不是你所抵达的站点，而是一种旅行的方式。
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

txt_en: Health and cheerfulness naturally beget each other.
txt_cn: 安康喜乐，相生相成。
author: Joseph Addison

txt_en: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
txt_cn: 生命中最重要的是学会给予爱，同时也要学会接纳爱。
author: Mitch Albom

txt_en: Anything looked at closely becomes wonderful.
txt_cn: 在近距离的观察下，任何事物都会显得美妙无比。
author: A. R. Ammons

txt_en: Love is when you are as concerned about someone else's situation as you are about your own.
txt_cn: 爱就是像关心自己一样去关心别人。
author: Mitch Albom

txt_en: The most wasted day of all is that on which we have not laughed.
txt_cn: 没有笑声的一天就是最虚度的一天。
author: Nicolas Chamfort

txt_en: Only an open heart will allow you to float equally between everyone.
txt_cn: 唯有一颗坦诚的心才能使你平等地对待每个人。
author: Mitch Albom

txt_en: The farther behind I leave the past, the closer I am to forging my own character.
txt_cn: 我把过去抛得越远，便越接近于我自己锻造的自我。
author: Isabelle Eberhardt

txt_en: Ill habits gather unseen degrees, as brooks make rivers, rivers run to seas.
txt_cn: 正如小溪汇聚成河流，河流汇入大海，坏习惯也会不知不觉积重难返。
author: John Dryden

txt_en: Don't cry when the sun is gone, because the tears won't let you see the stars.
txt_cn: 不要在太阳落下时哭泣，因为泪水会让你错过星星。
author: Violeta Parra

txt_en: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
txt_cn: 成功不是你爬了多高，而是你如何为这个世界带来积极的影响。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
txt_cn: 最重要的不是生命，而是美好的生命。
author: Socrates

txt_en: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
txt_cn: 生命如花，爱情是蜜。
author: Victor Hugo

txt_en: I'm not telling you it is going to be easy, I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
txt_cn: 我不会告诉你这个过程很容易。我只会说，这一切都是值得的。
author: Art Williams

txt_en: All of us, at certain moments of our lives, need to take advice and to receive help from other people.
txt_cn: 在生命的某些时刻，我们每个人都需要听取他人的意见，接受他人的帮助。
author: Alexis Carrel

txt_en: Plans to protect air and water, wilderness and wildlife are in fact plans to protect man.
txt_cn: 那些保护空气、水和野生动物的计划，实际上是为了保护人类自己。
author: Stewart Udall

txt_en: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
txt_cn: 如果你不知道要驶向哪个港口，任何风向都毫无助益。
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

txt_en: Dads are most ordinary men turned by love into heroes, adventurers, story-tellers, and singers of songs.
txt_cn: 父亲们不过是群普通人，但爱让他们化身英雄、探险家、说书人和歌者。
author: Pam Brown

txt_en: The sun always has ways to reach us.
txt_cn: 太阳总有办法照到我们，不管我们在哪里。
author: Kazuo Ishiguro

txt_en: Whomever you become, whatever you make yourself into, that is who you always were.
txt_cn: 无论你成为谁，无论你把自己变成了什么，那就是你本来的样子。
author: Tara Westover
